snippet: Element Case, a maker of iPhone cases, wants to play mechanic to your designer. The company is offering a customized version of its luxury-priced Vapor Comp and Vapor Pro cases, which encircle your iPhone with a metal frame.
abstract: Element Case, a maker of iPhone cases, wants to play mechanic to your designer. The company is offering a customized version of its luxury-priced Vapor Comp and Vapor Pro cases, which encircle your iPhone with a metal frame.

headline.main: An iPhone Case in Custom Metal
headline.print_headline: Designing a Personal iPhone Case, Right Down to the Screws
